edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.history

Class PlayerHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.history.PlayerHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepEquatable

    public class PlayerHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeepEquatable
    The history specific to a player. Contains the events seen by the player, as well as loggers related to the actions of the corresponding player.
    Author:
    The Condor
